courses.name: Selected Topics in Constitutional Law
courses.desc: This course explores in greater detail important issues and debates in constitutional law.  A new topic is explored in detail in each offering. The course is taught by a visiting expert scholar and/or practitioner in that area.

courses.name: Fundamental Freedoms in the Canadian Charter
courses.desc: Examines the fundamental freedoms contained in Section Two of the Charter. It reviews theory and jurisprudence on matters related to religion, expression, assembly and association.
